newsitem.title: USA: TMC Agroworld contract upped to $405 mln.
newsitem.headline: TMC Agroworld contract upped to $405 mln.

text.p: TMC Agroworld Corp, formerly known as Power Phone Inc, said on Thursday the total value of its urea fertilizer delivery contract had been increased by $141 million, to $405 million.

A previously signed and executed contract to deliver 2.1 million metric tons of urea fertilizer valued at $264 million to a commodities company in Belgium was amended to include the delivery of another 975,000 metric tons, the company said.
The company was not immediately available to comment further.
